CustomField.description: WAMCRM: Define whether this is Group Company, or Distributor
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
is Group Company, Company, or Distributor Account? Example of Group Company: - Bank of China
Example of Company: - Bank of China (HK) Limited
Example of Distributor - Bank of China (HK) Limited AC1 - Bank of China (Hong Kong) Limited / AC2
CustomField.label: Hierarchy level
